message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $125.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $120 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not convinced that we're at the right price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $128.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $125 for the product.
